interactions.summary_short: Omega-3 fatty acids may increase bleeding risk when used with warfarin.
interactions.mechanism: Omega-3 fatty acids reduce platelet aggregation and may enhance anticoagulant effects.
interactions.clinical_effect: Easy bruising, prolonged bleeding, increased INR in some patients.
interactions.management: Use standard doses only. Monitor INR closely. Inform prescribing clinician.
